events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it does not fit well and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request for a product that the customer wants to return.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you further with your request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to process a refund for your jacket. How can I assist you further?
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, hasn't been worn, and is still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund once you ship the jacket back to us. I will send you the return label shortly via email.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I'll ship it back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
